text: Ivo Žerava (born 31 December 1971) is a Czech rower. He competed in the men's coxed four event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Czech male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Czechoslovakia Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Brno
title: Ivo Žerava
